description: Triangle T(n,k) = number of fixed 2 X n polyominoes with k cells = coefficient of x^n*y^k in (1+x*y)/(1-x*y-x*y^2-x^2*y^3)-1, read by rows in order 00, 10, 01, 20, 11, 02, ...
references: R. C. Read, Contributions to the cell growth problem, Canad. J. Math., 14 (1962), 1-20.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 04 2001
